translation.en: Netflix.
♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Clap your hands and stamp your feet ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.it: Batti mani e piedi Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ Come with us and you will meet ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ Full of joy and processed meat ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.it: Fatto di carne gioiosa Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ Wiener, winner ♪ ♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Super-friendly hot dog wiener ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ But not the kind you had for dinner ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.it: Ma non mangiarlo a cena Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ An awesome, bright-pink wiener winner ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.it: Un fantastico salsicciotto rosa Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ Wiener! Winner! Wiener! Winner! ♪ ♪ Wiener! Winner! Wiener! Winner! ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky, yeah! ♪
translation.it: Salsicciotto che fa il botto, Pinky Malinky, sì!

translation.en: [panting] Did you get that?
Hey, JJ, what's going on? Why aren't you getting changed?
translation.it: JJ, che hai? Non ti cambi?

translation.en: [grunts] There's something weird going on over by my locker.
-What do you mean? -I'll show you.
Look, I'll do it again.
-[gasps] -See what I mean?
Every single time. [gasps]
[Pinky] Yeah. That is weird, bro.
Today's Would You Rather:
Would you rather have a giant third eyeball in your forehead
translation.it: Preferite un terzo occhio in fronte,

translation.en: or have lobster claws for hands? Babs?
translation.it: o avere chele al posto delle mani? Babs?

translation.en: Uh, do the lobster claws come with super strength?
-Nope. -Third eyeball all the way, bro.
translation.it: - No. - Terzo occhio tutta la vita.

translation.en: Really? I thought you'd be more of a lobster--
translation.it: Sì? Pensavo fossi più da chele.

translation.en: -[automated voice] Stop. -Huh?
-Stop. -[Babs] Oh!
-Stop. -[Babs] Talking stop sign?
[gasps] The robots are here.
Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop...
So, when did they put this in?
Yeah, I saw them installing it last night.
translation.it: Ho visto che lo installavano ieri.

translation.en: Why? What was wrong with the old one?
translation.it: Che aveva di male quello vecchio?

translation.en: I don't know. It was old, I guess.
Welcome to Episode One of Bob's Road Safety Ride-Along!
translation.it: Sicurezza stradale con Bob, episodio uno!

translation.en: Today, I'm going to teach you
all about staying safe and distraction-free on the road.
translation.it: a guidare in sicurezza e senza distrarsi.

translation.en: I've got six different cameras installed to make sure we don't miss anything I say.
translation.it: Ho messo sei telecamere così non perdete niente di quel che dico.

translation.en: There's even one in the trunk. What-what?
translation.it: Ne ho anche una nel bagagliaio. Come?

translation.en: Okay, let's go!
-[automated voice] Stop. Stop. Stop... -[Bob exclaims]
-New stop sign! -[car horn honking]
Aw, yeah!
Out with the old, in with the new, boy!
translation.it: Via il vecchio, viva il nuovo!

translation.en: -Stop. Stop. Stop... -Stop!
-"Out with the old, in with the new"? -[JJ] Yeah, bo-bo-boy!
translation.it: - "Via il vecchio, viva il nuovo"? - Oh, sì!

translation.en: [chuckles] JJ.
I mean, I'm all for modernization,
like the time I designed a solar-powered suit.
translation.it: come quando ho creato una tuta a energia solare.

translation.en: I liked the old one. It was a perfectly good stop sign.
translation.it: Mi piaceva il vecchio. Era un ottimo segnale di stop.

translation.en: I mean, come on, it's been in most of the videos we've shot around here.
translation.it: È in quasi tutti i video che abbiamo girato qui.

translation.en: Winter in Sackenhack!
[all groaning] Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot!
[Pinky] We used to give it hats -for all the holidays. -[camera shutter clicking]
translation.it: Gli mettevamo cappelli per le feste.

translation.en: That old stop sign was cool. It was special to us.
translation.it: Era un bel segnale. Era speciale per noi.

translation.en: How many of our other favorite things in Sackenhack are gonna get replaced?
translation.it: Rimpiazzeranno altre cose di Sackenhack che amiamo?

translation.en: The old whale slide? Or the chinchilla-spank billboards?
translation.it: Il balena-scivolo? Il cartello che sculaccia il cincillà?

translation.en: All these things have special memories for me and my friends.
translation.it: Cose legate a ricordi speciali per tutti noi.

translation.en: If only there was a way to protect them from changing.
translation.it: Se solo potessimo proteggerli dal cambiamento.

translation.en: "Beary McBear-Face, Sackenhack's founder."
This is really an important landmark. You can tell by the shiny, gold plaque.
translation.it: È un monumento importante, si nota dalla targa d'oro luccicante.

translation.en: Let's go get some boba. [Perry] Mom, you know I'm allergic to boba.
translation.it: - Prendiamo un bubble tea. - Mamma, sono allergico!

translation.en: -This is really an important landmark. -[Pinky] Hmm.
Gold plaque.
-Hmm. -Boba. Hmm. [squeals]
Oh, I know what to do! [chuckles]
-Come on, guys. -Dude, what are we doing out here?
JJ, do you remember that music video we shot in front of this mural?
translation.it: Ricordi il video musicale che abbiamo girato qui?

translation.en: Yeah, dog!
♪ Three lil' piggies ♪
♪ Lil' piggies in the city Lil' piggies gettin' jiggy ♪
translation.it: Porcellini in città Che ci danno dentro

translation.en: Well, how would you feel if they painted over this
translation.it: Come ti sentiresti se lo coprissero

translation.en: or even knocked the wall down to build a new one?
translation.it: o se tirassero giù il muro?

translation.en: What? No, bro!
They can't knock down our history. They can't do that.
translation.it: Non abbatteranno la nostra storia! Non possono!

translation.en: No, they can't.
Not if we make absolutely sure that this landmark is preserved forever.
translation.it: Basta assicurarci che questo monumento venga protetto.

translation.en: ♪ How we gonna do that I say, how we gonna do that? ♪
translation.it: E come facciamo? Dico, come facciamo?

translation.en: ♪ Is you gonna tell me How we do that, baby, do that? ♪
translation.it: Me lo dici tu come facciamo, baby?

translation.en: With this.
A shiny gold seal showing everyone how important this place is.
translation.it: Un sigillo dorato che segnali l'importanza del luogo.

translation.en: Whoa, so gold and shiny.
Whoa, that is bright. Respect.
Exactly, JJ. People respect both goldness and shininess.
translation.it: Esatto, JJ. La gente rispetta l'oro e la luccicosità.

translation.en: Uh, we put these on all of our favorite places around town,
translation.it: Se mettiamo questi sui nostri posti preferiti,

translation.en: and then people will know to leave them as they are.
translation.it: tutti sapranno che devono rimanere come sono.

translation.en: That way, we can preserve our Sackenhack just the way it is.
translation.it: Così manterremo Sackenhack proprio com'è ora.

translation.en: Preserved!
Pinky, I wanna kiss the inside of your hammy mind.
translation.it: Pinky, voglio baciare la tua mente prosciuttosa.

translation.en: Aw, Babba-Dabba!
I'm preserving this old phone booth because it's where I first met Todd.
translation.it: Voglio proteggere la cabina dove ho incontrato Todd.

translation.en: It's very important that Sackenhack doesn't change too much.
translation.it: È importante che Sackenhack non cambi troppo.

translation.en: So, when the aliens come back, they'll know where to find me.
translation.it: Così quando torneranno gli alieni, mi troveranno.

translation.en: [Pinky] The ski jump.
The most important landmark in Sackenhack
translation.it: Il monumento più importante in città.

translation.en: -and the foundation of our friendship. -[camera shutter clicking]
We gotta preserve it!
Preserved!
Now it'll be safe forever.
-[ski jump creaking] -Uh, let's look from over there.
Like, way over there.
Preserved. Our favorite park bench.
Now, it'll be here forever, along with our favorite view.
translation.it: Ora sarà qui per sempre insieme al panorama.

translation.en: Guys, you should feel proud.
Our Sackenhack is gonna stay exactly the way we like it.
translation.it: Sackenhack resterà esattamente come la vogliamo.

translation.en: I'm going to take a pano to celebrate.
Wait. Uh, what's he doing?
[squeals] Hey, hey! Wait, wait, wait! -Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! -Huh?
You can't take that! [grunting]
Hi. [chuckles]
This needs to stay here, where it's always been.
translation.it: Questa deve restare dov'è sempre stata.

translation.en: Uh, but it's broken.
Preserved. It's staying here. Hmph!
Oh, shiny. Gold seal. Yeah. Yep, seems legit. My bad.
translation.it: Oh, luccicoso. Dorato. Sì, mi sembra giusto. Scusa.

translation.en: That was close. They almost got away with this vending machine.
translation.it: C'è mancato poco. Stavano per portarla via.

translation.en: Um, isn't it broken?
Someone could say that about you, JJ.
translation.it: Potrebbero dire lo stesso di te.

translation.en: Truth.
It doesn't matter if it's broken.
This is where we get our snacks,
translation.it: È qui che compriamo gli snack,

translation.en: for when we sit on the bench to look at the view.
translation.it: e poi ci sediamo ad ammirare la vista.

translation.en: Ooh, I'm on to something.
The vending machine, the view, it's all connected.
translation.it: La macchinetta. La vista. È tutto collegato.

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
Don't you see? It's part of the whole experience.
If you take one thing out, everything is ruined.
translation.it: Se togli una cosa rovini tutto!

translation.en: We need to keep, uh... Ah!
[panting] This leaky, old water fountain. Preserved.
And this puddle shaped like a rabbit. Preserved.
Ah, yeah. Oh, okay, I get it. [panting]
Big Tony the Trash Can. Preserved.
Yeah! And this tree with purple leaves. Preserved.
translation.it: L'albero con le foglie viola. Protetto.

translation.en: Even... [grunting and panting]
Chelsea, the chess-playing park man. [grunts] Preserved.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no. It's okay, it's okay.
[whispers] You're not going anywhere. Can I call my family?
translation.it: - Non ti muovere. - Posso chiamare la mia famiglia?

translation.en: Friends, if we want the Sackenhack we know and love to stay the same,
translation.it: Se vogliamo che la città che amiamo resti com'è,

translation.en: I mean, exactly the same,
we gotta stick shiny gold seals on everything.
translation.it: dobbiamo incollare sigilli dorati su tutto.

translation.en: -Are you with me? -Locked and loaded.
We're expanding operations.
It's not just the big, obvious things.
translation.it: Non sono solo le cose grosse.

translation.en: It's the tiny details that make Sackenhack special.
translation.it: Sono i dettagli a rendere speciale Sackenhack.

translation.en: And they need shiny gold seals, too.
Road safety tip 89.
Always keep your windows and mirrors clean to see everything.
translation.it: Tenere puliti i vetri per vedere tutto bene.

translation.en: -[Pinky] Preserved. -Huh?
Hey, Bob.
Preserved. There.
Phew, we did it.
Everything that makes Sackenhack special is now safe from change forever.
translation.it: Ciò che rende speciale Sackenhack è al sicuro.

translation.en: [Perry's Mom] What is all over this water fountain?
[crying] I wanna live with Dad!
[Coach Freebird] Hey, hey! That's my baby!
[crying] They took my baby!
I didn't see the sign 'cause I don't...
translation.it: Non ho visto il segnale perché non so...e ora non...

translation.en: [mumbling] My baby!
translation.it: perché non so...e ora non... Il mio bambino!

translation.en: Hold on. What kind of monster
translation.it: Ferme! Che mostro incollerebbe assieme due papere?

translation.en: -would stick ducks together? -[ducks quacking]
translation.it: Che mostro incollerebbe assieme due papere?

translation.en: What have we done? We've ruined Sackenhack.
translation.it: Cos'abbiamo fatto? Abbiamo rovinato la città.

translation.en: Ugh. Our plan kind of backfired.
translation.it: Il piano ci si è ritorto contro.

translation.en: Totally.
[sighs] I know whose fault this is.
translation.it: So di chi è la colpa.

translation.en: Aw, Pinky. Don't blame yourself.
It's that new talking stop sign.
translation.it: È del nuovo segnale di stop!

translation.en: If it wasn't for that thing, none of this would have happened.
Yeah. Everything was fine until it showed up.
So much for modernization.
That stop sign is...
It's... it's bad.
Ugh! Real bad!
Yeah! That stop sign needs to pay.
-[automated voice] Stop. Stop. Stop... -[all grunting]
You'd like that, wouldn't you?
You'd like us to stop, wouldn't you? Not today, stop sign!
translation.it: Ti piacerebbe stopparci? Non oggi, segnale!

translation.en: Get back in there, tiger!
[automated voice] Stop.
-Stop. Stop. Stop. -You tell him, Pinky! [yelling]
-Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. -[grunting and yelling]
Safety tip number 500.
When the sun is low, watch out,
'cause the light might reflect off your rear view mirrors and blind--
translation.it: Perché la luce potrebbe riflettersi e accecar...

translation.en: [shouting] Whoa! Whoa!
[grunting] It's sun blindness!
Stop. Stop. Stop.
Did somebody say "stop"? [yelling]
-Stop. Stop. Stop. -[Bob] Oh, God.
-Stop. Stop. -[Pinky gasps]
Oh! Pinky, are you all right? I nearly hit you.
translation.it: Pinky! Stai bene? Ti ho quasi preso.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm... I'm fine. Thanks.
[gasps] Thanks to that stop sign.
Well, there's a lesson for us all in road safety.
Nice work, partner.
[groaning] Air bags.
[gasps] No!
-[panting] Oh, stop sign. -[automated voice weakly] Stop.
No, no. I won't stop. I... I need to tell you--
-[slowly] Stop... -[shushes]
Save your breath. Save your breath, sweet little stop sign.
translation.it: Non sprecare il fiato, dolce segnale.

translation.en: -Listen, I need to-- -[slowly] Stop...
Dude, just let me say my thing.
I had you figured all wrong. You... You saved my life.
translation.it: Ti avevo frainteso. Mi hai...salvato la vita.

translation.en: [slowly] Stop...
-No, no, no, no, don't go! -[sputtering]
Goodbye, friend.
So, I guess nothing stays the same forever.
Babs, JJ and I, we're gonna change.
And Sackenhack will change with us.
But that's nothing to be scared of.
translation.it: Non c'è motivo di averne paura.

translation.en: Uh, here's your new stop sign.
[sassy automated voice] Stop. Stop...
Ooh! Sassy sign.
Welcome to Sackenhack, new friend.
-Stop. -[giggles] So sassy.
♪ Three lil' piggies ♪
♪ Lil' piggies in the city Lil' piggies gettin' jiggy ♪
translation.it: Porcellini in città Che ci danno dentro

translation.en: ♪ Three lil' piggies Three piggies in the city ♪
[modulated voice] ♪ Piggy in the city ♪
-♪ Piggy in the city ♪ -♪ Uh, yeah ♪
♪ Three piggies in the city Gettin' jiggy, uh ♪
-[modulated voice] ♪ Piggy in the city ♪ -♪ All right ♪
♪ Three lii' piggies ♪
♪ Lil' piggies in the city, yeah ♪
♪ Lil' piggies gettin' jiggy All right ♪
♪ Three lil' piggies, uh! Three piggies in the city ♪
♪ These are people Who worked on the show ♪
♪ Some you'll recognize Some you won't know ♪
♪ What brought them all together Is they worked on this show ♪
translation.it: Tutte insieme perché hanno lavorato qui

translation.en: ♪ Did stuff on this show Had jobs on this show ♪
translation.it: Hanno fatto cose Lavorato per lo show!

translation.en: ♪ These are people in real life Some have children, husbands and wives ♪
translation.it: Sono persone vere Alcune sono sposate con figli

translation.en: ♪ Some don't have any of those And that's okay too ♪
translation.it: Altre no ma va bene anche così

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause whatever they do That's okay too ♪
translation.it: Non importa Va bene anche così

translation.en: ♪ Hey, hey These are people ♪
♪ Hey, hey These are people ♪
